channel.title: Posts on Vadim Pidoshva
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Vadim Pidoshva

item.title: Online Groceries Project is Posted
item.description: Just uploaded my Online Groceries project structure and implementation description. Once again, the project was inspired by UVU project which required me to write invoice.py script. I worked on design of reverse program order.py. Here I described the structure of data storage and implementation of order.py as well as invoice.py.

item.title: geleus.com = geleus.io
item.description: geleus.com redirects to geleus.io Recently reserved geleus.com domain and set up redirection to this website geleus.io.

item.title: Working on Online Groceries
item.description: Currently working on “Online Groceries” program inspired by UVU class. The idea is to collect items with customer information as you would do when shopping online and create a structure for storage of such data. This data is later being used to create a well structured invoice with items purchased and customers’ information. I’ve already created invoice.py program that stores structured receipt to the order_details.txt (that was an in-class project), now I’m writing a reverse program order.

item.title: Website is Developing
item.description: Alert Website is still in the developing mode. Many features aren’t working/working properly yet. This is still a fresh idea that requires time to be realized.

item.title: Website Created
item.description: This is my project/progress website. I will be posting completed/in_progress projects as well as the important links.
